mapper.sql: SELECT B.CHANNELID,I.CHANNELNAME,B.BANKID,B.MODTIME,B.SERVICE_USER,B.STATE,B.MODLOCK FROM UMPAY.T_HF_CHNL_BANK B,UMPAY.T_HF_CHNL_INF I WHERE B.CHANNELID=I.CHANNELID #if( $channelName && $channelName!='' ) AND I.CHANNELNAME LIKE '%$channelName%' #end #if( $channelId && $channelId != '' ) AND B.CHANNELID = :channelId #end #if( $bankId && $bankId != '' ) AND B.BANKID = :bankId #end #if( $service_user && $service_user != '' ) AND B.SERVICE_USER = :service_user #end #if( $state && $state != '' ) AND B.STATE = :state #end #if( $from && $from != '' && $to && $to != '') AND B.MODTIME BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to' #end ORDER BY B.MODTIME DESC
